subtitle: These pork burgers are very easy to make.

method.text: Melt the butter in a frying pan. Add the salad onions and saute for 1-2 min or until softened. Remove from the heat and leave to cool slightly.
In a bowl, mix together the minced pork, tomato ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, cheese and seasoning to taste. Stir in the cooled onions until well mixed.
Using lightly floured hands, divide the mixture into equal portions and shape into burger shapes. Or alternatively, if you have a burger press, use this to make into burgers. Chill for 30 min.
Preheat the grill to medium. Grill the burgers for 5-8 min on each side or until cooked through.

title: Cheesy pork burgers
